      • createItem

        public Item createItem(java.lang.String name,
                       ItemEnum itemEnum,
                       AbilityEnum enchantmentType)
        this method creates new items.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the item it is also pk(primary key) for hibernet.
        itemEnum - the type of the item we will create.
        enchantmentType - the ability of character that this item will enchant.
        Returns:
        Item the new item that created user.
